ModMetaData.name: Pawn Wealth Adjustment
ModMetaData.author: CrazyCaityCat
ModMetaData.description:
Allows user to adjust the wealth value of a pawns skills.
I mostly made this mod for a content creator but I am releasing it to any others who would like to use it. Adjusting the wealth value that a pawns skills add to a colony will alter the raid value calculation that your storyteller uses to decide how powerful your next raid will be.
